heading: Safety
desc: To secure your protection and guard against fraud, our Trust & Safety team is on duty around-the-clock. Additionally, we guarantee donor protection. We have rightly earned the trust of respected institutions and government officials around the world.

heading: Aid
desc: Lemonraise has helped families and communities get back on their feet quickly. We have successfully delivered over $1 million directly to individuals and communities in need. This is in line with our vision to help raise funds for their various needs in Africa.

heading: Connect
desc: Lemonraise makes it simple to spread your message via email, SMS, and social media to gain support for your cause. Furthermore, we have a dedicated staff that is seeking for outstanding stories to highlight and share with the media and our community.
